description: Rome is the capital city of Italy. It is also the capital of the Lazio region, the centre of the Metropolitan City of Rome, and a special comune named Comune di Roma Capitale.

resturants.name: La Pergola
resturants.address: Via Alberto Cadlolo, 101, 00136 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: La Pergola is an exquisite fine dining restaurant located in Rome. Situated on Via Alberto Cadlolo, it offers a luxurious and elegant dining experience. The restaurant is known for its impeccable service, innovative cuisine, and breathtaking views of the city. La Pergola is a perfect choice for those seeking a memorable culinary journey in a refined setting.

resturants.name: Aroma Osteria
resturants.address: Via Labicana 125 Palazzo Manfredi, 00184 Rome Italy
resturants.description: Aroma Osteria is a charming restaurant located in Palazzo Manfredi on Via Labicana. It specializes in traditional Italian cuisine, offering a combination of classic flavors and innovative twists. With its cozy ambiance and attentive service, Aroma Osteria provides a delightful dining experience for those looking to savor authentic Italian dishes.

resturants.name: Roscioli
resturants.address: Via dei Giubbonari, 21, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Roscioli is an award-winning fine dining restaurant situated on Via dei Giubbonari. It is renowned for its exceptional culinary creations, using the finest ingredients to deliver a gourmet experience. With its elegant atmosphere, knowledgeable staff, and a menu that combines traditional and innovative flavors, Roscioli promises an unforgettable gastronomic journey.

resturants.name: Trattoria Da Danilo
resturants.address: Via Petrarca, 13, 00185 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Trattoria Da Danilo is a cozy restaurant located on Via Petrarca. It specializes in seafood dishes, offering a variety of fresh and flavorful options. While the ambiance is casual, the focus is on serving delicious seafood prepared with care. Trattoria Da Danilo is a great choice for seafood enthusiasts looking for a relaxed dining experience.

resturants.name: Tonnarello
resturants.address: Via della Paglia, 1, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Tonnarello is a delightful restaurant located on Via della Paglia. It specializes in traditional Italian cuisine, offering a wide range of classic dishes prepared with fresh ingredients and authentic flavors. With its warm and welcoming atmosphere, Tonnarello provides a memorable dining experience for those seeking a taste of traditional Roman cuisine.

resturants.name: Armando al Pantheon
resturants.address: Salita dei Crescenzi, 31, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Armando al Pantheon is a highly regarded restaurant situated on Salita dei Crescenzi. It specializes in traditional Roman cuisine, offering a menu that showcases the rich flavors of the region. With its cozy and rustic ambiance, attentive service, and dishes prepared with passion, Armando al Pantheon guarantees an authentic and satisfying dining experience.

resturants.name: Kathmandu - fast food
resturants.address: Via Buonarroti, 38, 00185 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Kathmandu is a fast-food restaurant located on Via Buonarroti. It offers a diverse menu featuring a variety of fast-food options. Whether you're in the mood for burgers, sandwiches, or other quick bites, Kathmandu provides a convenient and flavorful dining experience.

resturants.name: Roscioli Caffè Pasticceria
resturants.address: Piazza Benedetto Cairoli, 16, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Roscioli Caffè Pasticceria is a charming café and pastry shop situated on Piazza Benedetto Cairoli. It is known for its delectable desserts, pastries, and coffee. With its inviting atmosphere and a wide selection of sweet treats, Roscioli Caffè Pasticceria is the perfect place to satisfy your dessert cravings.

resturants.name: La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali
resturants.address: Via della Madonna dei Monti, 9, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali is located on Via della Madonna dei Monti. It offers a cozy and traditional dining experience, specializing in Italian desserts. From classic tiramisu to a variety of sweet delights, La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali is a must-visit for dessert lovers.

resturants.name: Ristorante Piperno
resturants.address: Monte de' Cenci, 9, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Ristorante Piperno is situated on Monte de' Cenci. It is a fine dining restaurant that focuses on providing a memorable culinary experience. With its refined ambiance and a menu that showcases the best of Italian cuisine, Ristorante Piperno offers an elegant setting for those seeking a sophisticated dining experience.

resturants.name: Five Guys
resturants.address: Roma Termini, Piazza dei Cinquecento, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Five Guys is a popular fast-food chain located in Roma Termini, Piazza dei Cinquecento. It is known for its delicious burgers, fries, and milkshakes. With its casual and vibrant atmosphere, Five Guys is a go-to spot for a quick and satisfying meal.

resturants.name: McDonald's
resturants.address: Via del Tritone 57-58 - 00187 Rome
resturants.description: McDonald's is a well-known fast-food chain situated on Via del Tritone. It offers a wide selection of fast-food options, including burgers, fries, and chicken sandwiches. McDonald's provides a convenient and familiar dining experience for those looking for a quick bite to eat.

resturants.name: Kilo Restaurant
resturants.address: Kilo Restaurant, Via Tirso, 30, 00198 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Kilo Restaurant is a renowned seafood restaurant located in Rome. With its prime location and a wide variety of seafood dishes, Kilo Restaurant offers a delightful dining experience. From fresh catches of the day to expertly prepared seafood delicacies, this restaurant ensures high-quality ingredients and excellent flavors. The restaurant's elegant ambiance and attentive service add to the overall experience, making it a popular choice for seafood enthusiasts.

resturants.name: "DOC" Cruderia EnoBistrot
resturants.address: Via Pietro Manzi, 1, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: "DOC" Cruderia EnoBistrot is a top-rated fine dining restaurant situated in Rome. Known for its sophisticated atmosphere and outstanding culinary offerings, this restaurant provides an exceptional gastronomic experience. The menu features a combination of innovative and traditional dishes, prepared with the finest ingredients. With attentive service and a charming ambience, "DOC" Cruderia EnoBistrot aims to create a memorable dining experience for its guests.

resturants.name: Imàgo
resturants.address: Piazza della Trinita' Dei Monti 6, Hassler Roma Hotel - 00187 Rome
resturants.description: Imàgo is a restaurant situated in Rome, located within the prestigious Hassler Roma Hotel. Offering traditional cuisine with a modern twist, Imàgo is known for its refined dishes and elegant presentation. The restaurant boasts breathtaking views of Rome's iconic landmarks, providing a stunning backdrop for a memorable dining experience. While the stars indicate a good rating, the true highlight of Imàgo lies in its fusion of traditional flavors and contemporary culinary techniques.

resturants.name: Yes food
resturants.address: Via Catania, 53, 00161 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Yes food is a fast food restaurant located in Rome. It offers a wide range of quick and tasty food options, perfect for those looking for a convenient and casual dining experience. The menu includes popular fast food items such as burgers, sandwiches, fries, and more. While the focus is on fast service, Yes food strives to maintain quality and freshness in its offerings, ensuring a satisfying meal for its customers.

resturants.name: Ristorante Crispi 19
resturants.address: Via Francesco Crispi 19 RM - 00187 Rome
resturants.description: Ristorante Crispi 19 is a well-regarded seafood restaurant in Rome. With a prime location and a reputation for excellence, it offers a diverse menu featuring a variety of seafood delicacies. From fresh fish to shellfish, Ristorante Crispi 19 ensures high-quality ingredients and skillful preparation. The restaurant's warm and inviting atmosphere, combined with attentive service, creates an enjoyable dining experience for seafood lovers.

resturants.name: Ai Tre Scalini
resturants.address: Via Panisperna, 251, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Ai Tre Scalini is a popular traditional restaurant located in Rome. Known for its authentic Italian cuisine and warm ambiance, the restaurant offers a range of traditional dishes prepared with care and attention to detail. From homemade pasta to classic meat and fish dishes, Ai Tre Scalini aims to provide a genuine taste of Roman cuisine. With its friendly staff and cozy setting, it's a great place to experience the flavors of traditional Italian cooking.

resturants.name: Chinappi
resturants.address: Via Augusto Valenziani, 19, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Chinappi is a seafood restaurant located in Rome. Known for its fresh seafood dishes and delightful flavors, Chinappi offers a wide range of culinary delights. From expertly prepared fish to flavorful shellfish, the restaurant takes pride in using high-quality ingredients to create memorable dining experiences. With its charming atmosphere and attentive service, Chinappi provides a welcoming environment for seafood enthusiasts.

resturants.name: Frigidarium
resturants.address: Via del Governo Vecchio, 112, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Frigidarium is a renowned dessert destination situated in Rome. This establishment is celebrated for its delectable gelato and mouth-watering sweet treats. With a wide array of flavors and creative combinations, Frigidarium offers a delightful experience for dessert lovers. The high-quality ingredients and exceptional craftsmanship make their gelato a must-try. The cozy atmosphere and friendly staff further enhance the overall experience.

resturants.name: Giolitti
resturants.address: Via degli Uffici del Vicario, 40, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Giolitti is a popular dessert destination located in Rome. Established in 1900, this historic gelateria offers a wide range of traditional Italian gelato flavors. With its rich and creamy textures, Giolitti's gelato has garnered a strong following over the years. The charming vintage decor and friendly service provide a nostalgic atmosphere, making it a favorite spot for locals and tourists alike.

resturants.name: Pierluigi
resturants.address: Piazza de' Ricci, 144, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Pierluigi is a seafood restaurant situated in Rome. With its prime location near Piazza Navona, this restaurant offers a range of seafood dishes prepared with fresh ingredients. From classic Italian seafood pasta to grilled fish specialties, Pierluigi aims to provide a satisfying dining experience. The restaurant's rustic yet elegant ambiance adds to its charm, making it a popular choice for seafood lovers.

resturants.name: Ristorante PORTO - Fish & Chips
resturants.address: Via Crescenzio, 56, 00193 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Ristorante PORTO - Fish & Chips is a seafood restaurant located in Rome. With a focus on fish and chips, this establishment offers a unique twist on traditional seafood dishes. The menu features a variety of freshly battered and fried fish, accompanied by homemade chips and flavorful sauces. Ristorante PORTO aims to provide a casual yet memorable dining experience, with a combination of quality ingredients, attentive service, and a relaxed atmosphere.

resturants.name: Pinoy Ristorante
resturants.address: Via Gaeta, 21, 00189 Roma RM, Italy
resturants.description: Pinoy Ristorante is a fast-food restaurant located in Rome. Specializing in Filipino cuisine, this restaurant offers a variety of quick and flavorful dishes. From traditional rice meals to popular street food options, Pinoy Ristorante aims to bring the authentic flavors of the Philippines to Rome. The restaurant's casual setting and efficient service make it a convenient choice for those looking to enjoy Filipino fast food.

shoppingPlaces.name: Galleria Alberto Sordi
shoppingPlaces.address: Piazza Colonna, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Galleria Alberto Sordi is a historic shopping mall located in the heart of Rome. It offers a blend of elegant shops, boutiques, cafes, and restaurants, making it a popular destination for both locals and tourists.

shoppingPlaces.name: Via del Corso
shoppingPlaces.address: Via del Corso, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Via del Corso is one of the main shopping streets in Rome, known for its wide range of fashion boutiques, department stores, and popular brands. It offers a vibrant shopping experience in the heart of the city.

shoppingPlaces.name: Via Condotti
shoppingPlaces.address: Via dei Condotti, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Via Condotti is a prestigious street in Rome, renowned for its luxury fashion boutiques, high-end jewelry stores, and designer brands. It attracts fashion enthusiasts and luxury shoppers from around the world.

shoppingPlaces.name: La Rinascente
shoppingPlaces.address: Via del Tritone, 61, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: La Rinascente is a famous department store in Rome, offering a wide range of products including fashion, cosmetics, home goods, and gourmet food. It provides a modern shopping experience and a great selection of international and Italian brands.

shoppingPlaces.name: Porta Portese Market
shoppingPlaces.address: Via di Porta Portese, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Porta Portese Market is one of the largest flea markets in Rome, known for its diverse selection of vintage clothing, antiques, furniture, books, and much more. It's a treasure trove for bargain hunters and collectors.

shoppingPlaces.name: Euroma2
shoppingPlaces.address: Viale dell'Oceano Pacifico, 83, 00144 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Euroma2 is a modern shopping center located on the outskirts of Rome. It features a wide range of shops, including fashion, electronics, home goods, and entertainment options such as cinemas and restaurants.

shoppingPlaces.name: Castel Romano Designer Outlet
shoppingPlaces.address: Via Ponte di Piscina Cupa, 64, 00128 Castel Romano RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Castel Romano Designer Outlet is a popular shopping destination near Rome, offering discounted prices on a variety of designer brands. It features a charming village-like setting and a wide selection of fashion, accessories, and homeware.

shoppingPlaces.name: Via Cola di Rienzo
shoppingPlaces.address: Via Cola di Rienzo, 00192 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Via Cola di Rienzo is a vibrant shopping street in Rome, known for its mix of local boutiques, department stores, and international brands. It offers a great shopping experience with a lively atmosphere.

shoppingPlaces.name: Via Borgognona
shoppingPlaces.address: Via Borgognona, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Via Borgognona is a charming street in Rome known for its luxury fashion boutiques, art galleries, and upscale shops. It offers a sophisticated shopping experience with a range of high-end brands and designer stores.

shoppingPlaces.name: Piazza di Spagna
shoppingPlaces.address: Piazza di Spagna, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Piazza di Spagna is a famous square in Rome that is home to the iconic Spanish Steps. It is a popular shopping area, featuring a mix of designer boutiques, luxury brands, and renowned Italian fashion houses.

shoppingPlaces.name: Centro Commerciale Aura
shoppingPlaces.address: Viale di Valle Aurelia, 30, 00167 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Centro Commerciale Aura is a modern shopping center located in Rome. It offers a wide range of shops, including fashion, electronics, home goods, and a variety of dining options, providing a convenient and enjoyable shopping experience.

shoppingPlaces.name: Centro Commerciale ROMAEST
shoppingPlaces.address: Via Collatina, Km 12.800, 00132 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Centro Commerciale ROMAEST is a large shopping mall located on the outskirts of Rome. It features a wide selection of shops, including fashion, electronics, home decor, and a range of entertainment options such as cinemas and restaurants.

shoppingPlaces.name: Maximo Shopping Center
shoppingPlaces.address: Via Laurentina, 865, 00143 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Maximo Shopping Center is a modern retail complex situated in the southern part of Rome. It offers a diverse range of shops, including fashion, electronics, and supermarkets, providing a convenient shopping experience for local residents.

shoppingPlaces.name: Isola Sas di Aron Sufir
shoppingPlaces.address: Via in Arcione, 113, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Isola Sas di Aron Sufir is a renowned antique store located near Piazza di Spagna in Rome. It specializes in a wide range of unique and collectible antiquities, attracting antique enthusiasts and collectors from around the city.

shoppingPlaces.name: Antiquities Alberto Di Castro
shoppingPlaces.address: Piazza di Spagna, 5, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Antiquities Alberto Di Castro is a prestigious antique shop situated in the vicinity of Piazza di Spagna. It offers a curated collection of fine antique furniture, artworks, and decorative objects, catering to discerning collectors and interior designers.

shoppingPlaces.name: Carlucci Gallerie Antiquarie
shoppingPlaces.address: Via del Babuino, 50, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Carlucci Gallerie Antiquarie is a well-established gallery of fine antiques located on Via del Babuino. It showcases a wide array of exquisite antiquefurniture, artwork, and decorative objects, offering a unique shopping experience for antique enthusiasts and collectors in Rome.

shoppingPlaces.name: Stone Island Store Roma
shoppingPlaces.address: Via del Babuino, 174/175, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Stone Island Store Roma is a flagship store located on Via del Babuino in Rome. It specializes in high-quality and innovative fashion for men, featuring the renowned Stone Island brand. The store showcases the latest collections and offers a premium shopping experience for fashion-forward individuals.

shoppingPlaces.name: Burberry
shoppingPlaces.address: La Rinascente, Via del Tritone, 61, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Burberry is a renowned luxury fashion brand located in La Rinascente on Via del Tritone in Rome. The store offers a wide selection of high-end clothing, accessories, and fragrances, showcasing Burberry's iconic British style and craftsmanship.

shoppingPlaces.name: Murano Max Murano Glass Rome
shoppingPlaces.address: Via dei Banchi Nuovi, 8, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: Murano Max Murano Glass Rome is a specialized store located on Via dei Banchi Nuovi. It features a stunning collection of handcrafted Murano glass artworks, including vases, sculptures, jewelry, and decorative items, showcasing the renowned Venetian glassmaking tradition.

shoppingPlaces.name: BD-SAS
shoppingPlaces.address: Via Milano, 35, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
shoppingPlaces.description: BD-SAS is a boutique store located on Via Milano in Rome. It offers a curated selection of trendy and fashionable clothing, accessories, and footwear for men and women. The store focuses on contemporary styles and aims to provide a unique shopping experience for fashion-conscious individuals.

oldPlaces.name: Colosseum
oldPlaces.address: Piazza del Colosseo, 1, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Colosseum is an ancient amphitheater located in Rome, Italy. It is one of the most iconic landmarks of the Roman Empire and a popular tourist attraction.

oldPlaces.name: Roman Forum
oldPlaces.address: Via della Salara Vecchia, 5/6, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Roman Forum is a rectangular plaza surrounded by the ruins of several important ancient government buildings. It served as the center of Roman public life for centuries.

oldPlaces.name: Pantheon
oldPlaces.address: Piazza della Rotonda, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Pantheon is a former Roman temple and now a church. It is known for its impressive dome and the oculus in the center, which allows natural light to enter the building.

oldPlaces.name: Trevi Fountain
oldPlaces.address: Piazza di Trevi, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Trevi Fountain is a famous Baroque fountain in Rome. It is known for its stunning sculptures and is a popular spot for visitors to throw coins into the water.

oldPlaces.name: Vatican City
oldPlaces.description: Vatican City is an independent city-state surrounded by Rome, Italy. It is the spiritual and administrative headquarters of the Roman Catholic Church and home to St. Peter's Basilica and the Vatican Museums.

oldPlaces.name: Spanish Steps
oldPlaces.address: Piazza di Spagna, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Spanish Steps is a famous staircase in Rome, connecting the Piazza di Spagna at the bottom with the Trinità dei Monti church at the top. It is a popular meeting point and gathering place.

oldPlaces.name: Castel Sant'Angelo
oldPlaces.description: Castel Sant'Angelo is a fortress located on the right bank of the Tiber River in Rome. It has served various purposes throughout history, including as a mausoleum, a castle, and a museum.

oldPlaces.name: Palatine Hill
oldPlaces.address: Via di San Gregorio, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: Palatine Hill is one of the seven hills of Rome and is considered the centermost of the famous Seven Hills of Rome. It offers panoramic views of the Roman Forum and the Circus Maximus.

oldPlaces.name: Baths of Caracalla
oldPlaces.address: Viale delle Terme di Caracalla,52, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Baths of Caracalla were ancient Roman public baths built during the reign of Emperor Caracalla. They were one of the largest and most impressive thermal complexes in ancient Rome.

oldPlaces.name: Piazza Navona
oldPlaces.description: Piazza Navona is a beautiful square in Rome, famous for its Baroque architecture and stunning fountains. It is a lively gathering place and a hub of activity with numerous cafes and street performers.

oldPlaces.name: Circus Maximus
oldPlaces.address: Via del Circo Massimo, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: Circus Maximus is an ancient Roman chariot racing stadium and entertainment venue. It was the largest stadium in ancient Rome and could accommodate over 150,000 spectators.

oldPlaces.name: Capitoline Hill
oldPlaces.address: Piazza del Campidoglio, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: Capitoline Hill is one of the seven hills of Rome and was the citadel of the ancient city. It now houses the Capitoline Museums, which showcase a vast collection of ancient art and artifacts.

oldPlaces.name: Ara Pacis
oldPlaces.address: Lungotevere in Augusta, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Ara Pacis is an ancient altar dedicated to the Roman goddess of peace, Pax. It is considered one of the most important works of Roman sculpture and is housed in a modern museum building.

oldPlaces.name: Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore
oldPlaces.address: Piazza di Santa Maria Maggiore, 42, 00185 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore is one of the major basilicas in Rome and is dedicated to the Virgin Mary. It is known for its beautiful mosaics and stunning interior.

oldPlaces.name: Palazzo Barberini
oldPlaces.address: Via delle Quattro Fontane, 13, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: Palazzo Barberini is a palace in Rome that houses the Galleria Nazionale d'Arte Antica, an art gallery with a vast collection of paintings, sculptures, and other artworks.

oldPlaces.name: Campo de' Fiori
oldPlaces.address: Campo de' Fiori, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: Campo de' Fiori is a lively square in Rome known for its bustling market during the day and vibrant nightlife. It is surrounded by restaurants, cafes, and historic buildings.

oldPlaces.name: Santa Maria in Trastevere
oldPlaces.address: Piazza di Santa Maria in Trastevere, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: Santa Maria in Trastevere is one of the oldest churches in Rome and is located in the charming Trastevere neighborhood. It is known for its beautiful mosaics and stunning interior.

oldPlaces.name: Catacombs of San Callisto
oldPlaces.address: Via Appia Antica, 110/126, 00179 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Catacombs of San Callisto are underground burial sites that were used by early Christians in Rome. They are one of the largest and most important catacombs in the city.

oldPlaces.name: Arch of Constantine
oldPlaces.address: Via di San Gregorio, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
oldPlaces.description: The Arch of Constantine is a triumphal arch in Rome, located near the Colosseum. It was built to commemorate the victory of Constantine the Great and is known for its well-preserved reliefs.

naturePlaces.name: Villa Borghese Gardens
naturePlaces.address: Piazzale Napoleone I, 00197 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: Vast urban park with formally landscaped gardens, a lake & villas now housing important museums.

naturePlaces.name: Botanical Garden of Rome
naturePlaces.address: Largo Cristina di Svezia, 23 A - 24, 00165 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: 7,000 plant species from around the world, plus fountains, a bamboo grove & a Japanese tea garden.

naturePlaces.name: Monte Mario
naturePlaces.description: Forested hill offering a nature reserve, observatory & panoramic views of the city & its monuments.

naturePlaces.name: Gianicolo Hill
naturePlaces.address: Piazzale Giuseppe Garibaldi, 00165 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: This historic, well-known hilltop terrace offers panoramic views of Rome.

naturePlaces.name: Parco degli Acquedotti
naturePlaces.description: Protected parkland with a Roman aqueduct & ancient archaeological sites, plus a former mill.

naturePlaces.name: Lake Bracciano
naturePlaces.description: a popular place for sailing, swimming & scuba diving.

naturePlaces.name: Tiber Island
naturePlaces.description: Compact island in a bend of the River Tiber with a number of historical buildings & monuments.

naturePlaces.name: Appian Way Regional Park
naturePlaces.address: Parco Regionale dell'Appia Antica, Via Appia Antica, 42, 00178 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: Park along 16 km of the Roman road preserving important ancient Roman tombs & villas.

naturePlaces.name: Villa Doria Pamphili
naturePlaces.address: Via di San Pancrazio, 00152 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: Landscaped park on ancient noble Roman estate, with open-air concerts, nature trails & fountain.

naturePlaces.name: Ostia Beach
naturePlaces.address: Lido di Ostia, 00122 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: Historical 150-meter jetty, first founded in 1940, ending in a circular observation space.

naturePlaces.name: Vatican Gardens
naturePlaces.description: Formal gardens within Vatican City, featuring fountains, sculptures & landscaped greenery.

naturePlaces.name: Janiculum Hill
naturePlaces.description: Hilltop park known for its panoramic views, statues, and memorials, including a large statue of Giuseppe Garibaldi.

naturePlaces.name: Villa Celimontana
naturePlaces.address: Via della Navicella, 12, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: Renaissance villa and park with ancient Roman ruins, gardens, and a summer jazz festival.

naturePlaces.name: Villa Ada
naturePlaces.description: Large park with a lake, trees, and walking paths, offering a peaceful retreat from the city.

naturePlaces.name: Parco Savello (Orange Garden)
naturePlaces.address: Piazza Pietro D'Illiria, 00153 Roma RM, Italy
naturePlaces.description: Garden on the Aventine Hill with orange trees, rose beds, and a panoramic view of Rome.

nightPlaces.name: Teatro dell'Opera di Roma
nightPlaces.address: Piazza Beniamino Gigli, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Iconic 19th-century theater that's as visually dramatic & lavish as the opera productions it stages.

nightPlaces.name: Piazza Navona in Rome
nightPlaces.description: Elegant square dating from the 1st century A.D., with a baroque fountain, street artists & bars.

nightPlaces.name: Trevi Fountain in Rome
nightPlaces.address: Piazza di Trevi, 00187 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Aqueduct-fed rococo fountain, designed by Nicola Salvi & completed in 1762, with sculpted figures.

nightPlaces.name: The Roman Guy Tours
nightPlaces.address: Via di Ripetta, 142, 00186 Roma RM, Italy

nightPlaces.name: Castel Sant'Angelo
nightPlaces.description: Circular, 2nd-century castle housing furniture & paintings collections in Renaissance apartments.

nightPlaces.name: Roof Garden & Bar
nightPlaces.address: Via Giovanni Vitelleschi, 34, 00193 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: A roof that turns into a terrace for cocktails, private parties, business meetings or can also be used only to admire Rome from an unconventional perspective.

nightPlaces.name: Vatican Museums
nightPlaces.description: Multiple galleries of classical & Renaissance art masterpieces, plus the Sistine Chapel frescoes.

nightPlaces.name: Trastevere
nightPlaces.address: Trastevere, Rome, Metropolitan City of Rome Capital, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Colorful Trastevere is a funky, bohemian area that clings to its centuries-old, working-class roots. It's known for traditional and innovative trattorias, craft beer pubs and artisan shops, as well as simple B&Bs and budget hotels. From the pre-dinner passeggiata (promenade) until late, a young crowd buzzes around Piazza di San Calisto and Piazza Santa Maria in Trastevere, the site of a gilded, mosaic-filled church.

nightPlaces.name: Ice Club Roma
nightPlaces.address: Via della Madonna dei Monti, 18/19, 00184 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Cool cocktails & bar meals in a low-lit setting with a frosty vibe & decor made out of ice.

nightPlaces.name: La Cabala
nightPlaces.address: Via dei Soldati, 25c, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Intimate nightclub on the top floor of a medieval building with views of the River Tiber.

nightPlaces.name: Disco Planet Rome
nightPlaces.address: Via del Commercio, 36, 00154 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Busy nightclub with multiple rooms & dance floors offering live bands & themed nights, plus a bar.

nightPlaces.name: Sharivari
nightPlaces.address: Via de' Nari, 14, 00186 Roma RM, Italy
nightPlaces.description: Elegant & glamorous venue with an Italian fine dining restaurant, a bistro & a stylish nightclub.

nightPlaces.name: Yellow Bar
nightPlaces.description: Low-lit, buzzing restaurant/bar in a hostel, with live music & an underground club.
